data.name: MekaFighters - Halloween Racer Wendy and JICE
data.detailed_description:
Unlocks an event skin for Wendy and JICE - Halloween Racer.

Wendy modified JICE as if it were a racer in the Meka races, hoping one day she can bring JICE there and win...
data.about_the_game:
Unlocks an event skin for Wendy and JICE - Halloween Racer.

Wendy modified JICE as if it were a racer in the Meka races, hoping one day she can bring JICE there and win...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 or Similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 TI or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX 11 Compatible
